title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Keeping a secret from a dear colleague or close friend is tricky business. You might weigh the pros and cons of spilling the beans today, and still be confused. Consider whether the confidential information is even yours to divulge, especially if someone else privately trusted you with their news. Additionally, picking the right time to share your revelation is critical if you wish it to be well-received Thankfully, you possess an eagle eye for spotting the truth, so rely on your intuitive judgment. Err on the side of discretion and you can't go wrong. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
